AccountForecast.name: AccountForecast
AccountForecast.description: Represents the rolling forecast record of a particular account. The forecast is       prepared using data directly from sales agreements, orders, and opportunities.

AccountId.description: ID of the account for which forecast is generated.

DefaultAccountGrowthPerc.description: Default value of the account growth metric used to calculate forecast for            the first time. The default value is zero.

DefaultMarketGrowthPerce.description: Default value of the market growth metric used to calculate forecast for the            first time. The default value is zero.

EndDate.description: Date till which forecast is generated and displayed for this account.

LastCalculatedDate.description: Date on which forecast was last calculated, either automatically or            manually.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was viewed.

Name.description: Name of the account forecast record.

OwnerId.description: Owner of the account.

StartDate.description: Date from which forecast is generated and displayed for this account. It is            automatically created in active status.

Status.description: Status of the forecast record.

TotalAdjustedRevenue.description: Total revenue after manual adjustments are made to the auto-calculated            forecast value.

TotalRevenue.description: Total revenue as calculated by the application based on forecast            calculations.

AccountForecastAdjustment.name: AccountForecastAdjustment
AccountForecastAdjustment.description: Represents the manual adjustments made to forecast values for a particular       account.

AccountProdPeriodForecas.description: Lookup to the account product period ID to which adjustments are made for            forecast.

AdjustedById.description: ID of the user who makes the adjustment.

AdjustedByName.description: Name of the user who makes the adjustment.

AdjustmentComments.description: Notes provided by the user stating reason for adjustment.

AdjustmentType.description: States whether adjustment is made to forecast quantity or forecast            revenue.

IsActive.description: Indicator of whether the adjustment is recorded as part of the edit history            or not. Only last three changes, including the auto-calculated value are            recorded.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was viewed.

Name.description: Name of the record.

AccountForecastPeriodMetric.name: AccountForecastPeriodMetric
AccountForecastPeriodMetric.description: Represents records of account metrics which vary by period but are not specific       for a product.

AccountForecastId.description: ID of the account forecast record which the period metrics are part            of.

AccountGrowthPercentage.description: Expected or projected rate of growth for the account, for that particular            forecast period.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was viewed.

MarketGrowthPercentage.description: Expected or projected rate of growth for the market, for that particular            forecast period.

Name.description: Name of the record.

PeriodId.description: ID of the period as derived from the Period entity based on the fiscal            year.

AccountProductForecast.name: AccountProductForecast
AccountProductForecast.description: Represents the cumulative values for planned quantities, opportunities, and       orders of a sales agreement for a given product across all periods in that rolling time       period.

AccountForecastId.description: ID of the account forecast record which the account product is part            of.

IsActive.description: Indicator of whether the product is active or not.

IsSystemGenerated.description: Indicator of whether the record was manually inserted or            system-generated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was viewed.

Name.description: Name of the product.

TotalAdjustedForecastedQ.description: Total forecasted quantity after manual adjustments are made.

TotalAdjustedForecastedR.description: Total forecasted revenue after manual adjustments are made.

TotalCurrentOrdersQuanti.description: Total quantity derived from orders in the current period.

TotalCurrentOrdersRevenu.description: Total revenue derived from orders in the current period.

TotalForecastedQuantity.description: Total forecasted quantity before manual adjustments are made.

TotalForecastedRevenue.description: Total forecasted revenue before a manual adjustment is made.

TotalOpportunityQuantity.description: Total quantity derived from opportunities in the current period.

TotalOpportunityRevenue.description: Total revenue derived from opportunities in the current period.

TotalPastOrdersQuantity.description: Total quantity derived from orders in the last forecast period.

TotalPastOrdersRevenue.description: Total revenue derived from orders in the last forecast period.

TotalSalesAgreementPlann.description: Total planned quantity derived from sales agreements in the current            period.
Total planned revenue derived from sales agreements in the current            period.

AccountProductPeriodForecast.name: AccountProductPeriodForecast
AccountProductPeriodForecast.description: Represents the quantity and revenue information of opportunities, sales       agreements, orders, and resultant forecasted quantities for a product in a particular time       period of the forecast rolling period. Other than the fields AdjustedForecastQuantity and       AdjustedForecastRevenue, no other fields of this object can be updated.

AccForecastPeriodMetricI.description: ID of each account forecast period metric used in forecast formula            calculations.

AccountProductForecastId.description: ID of a specific product for which forecast is calculated for this            period.

AdjustedForecastedQuanti.description: Forecasted quantity which is either auto-calculated or overwritten by a            user with edit access. The user-defined value is retained along with the            auto-calculated value.

AdjustedForecastedRevenu.description: Forecasted revenue which is either auto-calculated or overwritten by a user            with edit access. The user-defined value is retained along with the            auto-calculated value.

AdjustmentComments.description: User-defined notes stating the reason for a manual adjustment.

CurrentOrdersQuantity.description: Calculated quantity of all active orders for this account in the current            period.

CurrentOrdersRevenue.description: Calculated revenue of all active orders for this account in the current            period.

ForecastedQuantity.description: Auto-calculated quantity based on forecast formula and            configurations.

ForecastedRevenue.description: Auto-calculated revenue based on forecast formula and configurations.

IsActive.description: Indicator of whether the record is part of the forecast display period or            not.

LastCalculatedDate.description: Date when the value was last calculated, either due to rolling over or            through recalculation of forecast.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was viewed.

Name.description: Name of the record.

OpportunityQuantity.description: Calculated quantity of all active opportunities for this account in the            current period.

OpportunityRevenue.description: Calculated revenue of all active opportunities for this account in the            current period.

PastOrdersQuantity.description: Calculated quantity of all active orders for this account in the last            forecast period.

PastOrdersRevenue.description: Calculated revenue of all active orders for this account in the last            forecast period.

PeriodId.description: ID of the period as derived from the Period entity based on the fiscal            year.

SalesAgreementPlannedQua.description: Calculated quantity for all active sales agreements for this account in            the current period. This is calculated on a pro-rata basis if the sales            agreement period does not coincide with the forecast display period.

SalesAgreementPlannedRev.description: Calculated revenue for all active sales agreements for this account in the            current period. This is calculated on a pro-rata basis if the sales agreement            period does not coincide with the forecast display period.

StartDate.description: Date on which the period starts.

AdvAccountForecastFact.name: AdvAccountForecastFact
AdvAccountForecastFact.description: Represents information about the generated advanced account forecast          records.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the advanced account forecast                       record.

AdvAcctForecastSetPartnerId.description: The account forecast set partner for which the advanced account                       forecast records are generated.

AdvAcctForecastSetUseId.description: The advanced account forecast set use that's associated with the                       advanced account forecast fact record. Available in API version                       57.0 and later.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The currency used for the forecast values.

ForecastedQuantity.description: The total forecasted quantity for the generated advanced account                       forecast set records.

ForecastedRevenue.description: The total forecasted revenue for the generated advanced account                       forecast set records.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related                       record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, and                          LastReferenceDate is not null, the user                       accessed this record or list view indirectly.

LastYearOrderQuantity.description: The previous year order quantity for the generated advanced                       account forecast set records.

LastYearOrderRevenue.description: The previous year order revenue for the generated advanced account                       forecast set records.

Name.description: The name of the advanced account forecast fact.

OpportunityQuantity.description: The opportunity quantity for the generated advanced account                       forecast set records.

OpportunityRevenue.description: The opportunity revenue for the generated advanced account                       forecast set records.

OrderQuantity.description: The order quantity for the generated advanced account forecast set                       records.

OrderRevenue.description: The order revenue for the generated advanced account forecast set                       records.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this advanced account forecast fact.

PeriodId.description: The period for which the advanced account forecast records are                       generated.

PeriodStartDate.description: The start date of the period for which the advanced account                       forecast fact records are generated. Available in API version 54.0                       and later.

ProductId.description: The product for which the advanced account forecast records are                       generated.

SalesAgreementQuantity.description: The Sales Agreement quantity for the generated advanced account                       forecast set records.

SalesAgreementRevenue.description: The Sales Agreement revenue for the generated advanced account                       forecast set records.

Status.description: The status of the forecast set associated with the advanced                       account forecast record.

AdvAccountForecastPeriod.name: AdvAccountForecastPeriod
AdvAccountForecastPeriod.description: Represents information about the periods for which advanced account          forecasting is applied.

DisplayDuration.description: The number of periods of the period group for which forecast is                       generated and displayed.

ForecastPeriodGroupId.description: The forecast period group associated with the forecast                       period.

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence number of the period in the associated advanced                       account forecast period group.

Type.description: The type of the forecast period.

AdvAccountForecastSet.name: AdvAccountForecastSet
AdvAccountForecastSet.description: Represents a collection of fields to set up an advanced account forecast          set.

AccountFieldName.description: The field name for the account in the advanced account forecast                       fact record.

CalculationFrequency.description: The frequency at which the forecast set is recalculated                       automatically.

Description.description: The description of the advanced account forecast set record.

DeveloperName.description: The name of the advanced account forecast set record.

ForecastFactObjectName.description: The API Name of the object used to store the forecast facts.

ForecastPeriodGroupId.description: The forecast period group associated with the advanced account                       forecast set.

ForecastQuantityFieldName.description: The field name for the forecast quantity in the advanced account                       forecast fact record.

ForecastRevenueFieldName.description: The field name for the forecast revenue in the advanced account                       forecast record.

ForecastSetFieldName.description: The name of the field used to store the forecast set and fact                       object relation.

ForecastSetName.description: The name of the forecast set.

ForecastStatusFieldName.description: The field name for the Status in the advanced account forecast                       fact record.

GenerationDpeDefNameId.description: The name of the Data Processing Engine definition used to generate                       advanced account forecast fact records.

Language.description: The combined language and locale ISO code, which controls the                       language of the advanced account forecast fact set record.

MasterLabel.description: Label for this advanced account forecast set value. This display                       value is the internal label that doesn't get translated.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix that is associated with this object. Each                       Developer Edition org that creates a managed package has a unique                       namespace prefix. Limit: 15 characters. You can refer to a                       component in a managed package by using the namespacePrefix__componentName                       notation. The namespace prefix can have one of the following                          values.                           In Developer Edition orgs,                                NamespacePrefix is set to the                             namespace prefix of the org for all objects that support it,                             unless an object is in an installed managed package. In that                             case, the object has the namespace prefix of the installed                             managed package. This field’s value is the namespace prefix                             of the Developer Edition org of the package developer.                           In orgs that are not Developer Edition orgs,                                NamespacePrefix is set only for                             objects that are part of an installed managed package. All                             other objects have no namespace prefix.

PeriodFieldName.description: The field name for the period in the advanced account forecast                       fact record.

RecalculateDpeDefNameId.description: The Data Processing Engine definition used to recalculate advanced                       account forecast fact records.

RegenerationDpeDefNameId.description: The Data Processing Engine definition used to regenerate advanced                       account forecast fact records.

RolloverDpeDefNameId.description: The Data Processing Engine definition used to generate rollover                       advanced account forecast fact records.

RolloverFrequency.description: The frequency of rollover of the advanced account forecast                       records.

Status.description: The status of the advanced account forecast set.

AdvAcctForecastAdjPeriod.name: AdvAcctForecastAdjPeriod
AdvAcctForecastAdjPeriod.description: Represents details about the adjustment period of the advanced account          forecast values.

AdjustmentDayCount.description: The number of days during which forecast adjustments can be                       made.

AdvAccountForecastSetId.description: The forecast set associated with the advanced account forecast                       adjustment period.

Frequency.description: Indicates how frequently the adjustment windows will open.

ProfileId.description: The profile with which the forecast set can be adjusted.

StartDay.description: The day when forecast adjustments can begin.

AdvAcctForecastDimension.name: AdvAcctForecastDimension
AdvAcctForecastDimension.description: Represents information about the dimensions selected for an advanced account          forecast set.

AdvAcctForecastDimSourceId.description: The dimension source associated with the advanced account forecast                       set dimension record.

AdvAcctForecastSetId.description: The forecast set associated with the dimension.

DimensionFieldName.description: The API name of the field for the dimension in the custom object                       that contains the generated advanced account forecast records.

HierarchySequenceNumber.description: The display sequence of the dimension in the forecast data                       grid.

AdvAcctForecastDimSource.name: AdvAcctForecastDimSource
AdvAcctForecastDimSource.description: Represents information about the dimensions that can be used by advanced          account forecast sets to generate advanced account forecast records.

AdvAcctForecastDimSrcName.description: The name of the dimension source.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the object in the API. The name:                           must be 40 characters or fewer                           must begin with a letter                           can contain only underscores and alphanumeric                             characters                           can’t include spaces                           can’t end with an underscore                           can’t contain 2 consecutive underscores                          In managed packages, this field prevents naming conflicts on                       package installations. With this field, a developer can change the                       object’s name in a managed package and the changes are reflected in                       a subscriber’s organization.

Language.description: The combined language and locale ISO code, which controls the                       language of the advanced account forecast dimension source                       record.

MasterLabel.description: Label for this advanced account forecast dimension source record                       value. This display value is the internal label that doesn't get                       translated.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix that is associated with this object. Each                       Developer Edition org that creates a managed package has a unique                       namespace prefix. Limit: 15 characters. You can refer to a                       component in a managed package by using the namespacePrefix__componentName                       notation. The namespace prefix can have one of the following                          values.                           In Developer Edition orgs,                                NamespacePrefix is set to the                             namespace prefix of the org for all objects that support it,                             unless an object is in an installed managed package. In that                             case, the object has the namespace prefix of the installed                             managed package. This field’s value is the namespace prefix                             of the Developer Edition org of the package developer.                           In orgs that are not Developer Edition orgs,                                NamespacePrefix is set only for                             objects that are part of an installed managed package. All                             other objects have no namespace prefix.

SourceObjectName.description: The API name of the object that's used as a dimension to generate                       the advanced account forecast records.

AdvAcctForecastFactAdj.name: AdvAcctForecastFactAdj
AdvAcctForecastFactAdj.description: Represents information about adjustments made to advanced account forecast          fact records.

AdjustedById.description: The ID of the user who’s made an adjustment to the advanced                       account forecast fact record.

AdvAcctForecastFactId.description: The advanced account forecast fact record to which an adjustment                       was made.

AdvAcctForecastMeasureDefId.description: The forecast set measure definition of the forecast fact record to                       which the adjustment is being made.

Comment.description: Additional information related to the adjustment of the forecast                       data.

InitialValue.description: The forecast value in the forecast fact record before the                       adjustment is made.

UpdatedValue.description: The forecast value in the forecast fact record after the                       adjustment is made.

AdvAcctForecastMeasureDef.name: AdvAcctForecastMeasureDef
AdvAcctForecastMeasureDef.description: Represents information about the measures to be displayed in the advanced          account forecasts grid for the forecast set.

AdvAccountForecastSetId.description: The forecast set associated with the advanced account forecast                       metric.

AggregationType.description: The type of aggregation used for calculating advanced account                       forecast values.

ComputationMethod.description: The method used for calculating advanced account forecast                       values.

ForecastDataMeasureName.description: Field of the facts object used for this measure.

ForecastMeasureName.description: The name for the measure to show on UI.

ForecastMeasureType.description: Specifies the measure type used for the generated advanced                       forecast values.

IsAdjustmentTracked.description: Indicates whether the adjustments made to the advanced account                       forecast values for this metric are tracked.

AdvAcctForecastPeriodGroup.name: AdvAcctForecastPeriodGroup
AdvAcctForecastPeriodGroup.description: Represents information about advanced account forecast period records. This          is the parent object of all the related advanced account forecast period records.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the object in the API. The name:                           must be 40 characters or fewer                           must begin with a letter                           can contain only underscores and alphanumeric                             characters                           can’t include spaces                           can’t end with an underscore                           can’t contain 2 consecutive underscores                          In managed packages, this field prevents naming conflicts on                       package installations. With this field, a developer can change the                       object’s name in a managed package and the changes are reflected in                       a subscriber’s organization.

ForecastPeriodGroupName.description: The name of the advanced account forecast period group                       record.

Language.description: The combined language and locale ISO code, which controls the                       language of the advanced account forecast period group record.

MasterLabel.description: Label for this advanced account forecast period group value. This                       display value is the internal label that doesn't get                       translated.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix that is associated with this object. Each                       Developer Edition org that creates a managed package has a unique                       namespace prefix. Limit: 15 characters. You can refer to a                       component in a managed package by using the namespacePrefix__componentName                       notation. The namespace prefix can have one of the following                          values.                           In Developer Edition orgs,                                NamespacePrefix is set to the                             namespace prefix of the org for all objects that support it,                             unless an object is in an installed managed package. In that                             case, the object has the namespace prefix of the installed                             managed package. This field’s value is the namespace prefix                             of the Developer Edition org of the package developer.                           In orgs that are not Developer Edition orgs,                                NamespacePrefix is set only for                             objects that are part of an installed managed package. All                             other objects have no namespace prefix.

StartPeriod.description: The start period of the advanced account forecast period                       group.

Status.description: The status of the advanced account forecast period group.

AdvAcctForecastSetPartner.name: AdvAcctForecastSetPartner
AdvAcctForecastSetPartner.description: Represents a junction between an advanced account forecast set and an          account.

AccountId.description: The account that uses the forecast set for generating advanced                       account forecast records.

AdvAccountForecastSetId.description: The forecast set associated with the account.

ExternalReferenceNumber.description: The reference number of the account forecast set partner record                       used to associate it with the account forecast fact records.

LastCalculationDate.description: The date when the advanced account forecast values were last                       calculated for the associated account and forecast set.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the advanced account forecast set partner                       record.

AdvAcctForecastSetUse.name: AdvAcctForecastSetUse
AdvAcctForecastSetUse.description: Represents a junction between an advanced account forecast set and another object whose record serves as the context for generating forecasts. For example, a manufacturing program or a Sustainability Cloud object’s record can be the context for generating forecasts.

AdvAccountForecastSetId.description: The forecast set associated with the account.

ExternalReferenceNumber.description: The reference number of the manufacturing program record used to                       associate it with the account forecast fact records.

ForecastContextId.description: The object whose record is used as the context for generating                       forecasts.

Name.description: Name of the advanced account forecast use record.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the advanced account forecast set partner                       record.

AdvAcctFrcstDisplayGroup.name: AdvAcctFrcstDisplayGroup
AdvAcctFrcstDisplayGroup.description: Represents information about the groups for the advanced account forecast set          measures or dimensions.

AdvAccountForecastSetId.description: The forecast set associated with the advanced account forecast                       display group.

AdvAcctFrcstDisplayGroupName.description: The name of the advanced account forecast display group.

GroupType.description: Specifies the category for the display group.

IsDefault.description: Indicates whether the display group is the default group.

UserProfileId.description: The profile for which the display group is applicable.

AdvAcctFrcstDplyGroupItem.name: AdvAcctFrcstDplyGroupItem
AdvAcctFrcstDplyGroupItem.description: Represents information about the items associated with a display group for an          advanced account forecast set.

AdvAcctFrcstDisplayGroupId.description: The advanced account forecast display group that’s associated with                       the group item.

AdvAcctFrcstDplyGroupItemName.description: The name of the advanced account forecast display group item.

DisplayOrder.description: The display order of the display group item.

MeasureReferenceId.description: The ID of the measure associated with the display group item.

AssetAccountParticipant.name: AssetAccountParticipant
AssetAccountParticipant.description: Represents a junction between the Asset and Account objects describing the          association between a participating account and an asset.

AccountId.description: The stakeholder account associated with the asset.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the account.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date when the association between the stakeholder and the                       asset ended.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date when the association between the stakeholder and the                       asset was initiated.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the association between the stakeholder and the                       asset is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related                       record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, and                          LastReferenceDate is not null, the user                       accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the asset account participant.

StakeholderRole.description: Specifies the role of the associated account.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the asset account participant.

AssetContactParticipant.name: AssetContactParticipant
AssetContactParticipant.description: Represents a junction between the Asset and Contact objects describing the          association between a participating contact and an asset.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the contact.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the asset.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date when the association between the stakeholder and the                       asset ended.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date when the association between the stakeholder and the                       asset was initiated.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the association between the stakeholder and the                       asset is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the asset contact participant.

StakeholderRole.description: Specifies the role of the associated contact.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the asset contact participant.

AssetMilestone.name: AssetMilestone
AssetMilestone.description: Represents the key events in the lifecycle of an asset, such as          manufacturing, registration, or resale.

Address.description: The address associated with the milestone.

AssetId.description: The asset record that's associated with the milestone.

City.description: The city where the milestone occurred.

Country.description: The country where the milestone occurred.

Description.description: The description of the milestone.

ExpiredDate.description: The expiration date of the milestone.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates                       compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically                       provides this value based on the milestone location’s latitude and                       longitude coordinates.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related                       record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, and                          LastReferenceDate is not null, the user                       accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Latitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the                       milestone location. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and                       90 with up to 15 decimal places.

LocationId.description: The location associated with the milestone.

Longitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the                       milestone location. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and                       180 with up to 15 decimal places.

MilestoneDate.description: The date on which the milestone occurred.

Name.description: The name of the asset milestone.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of the location where the milestone occurred.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the milestone in the external                       system.

SourceSystemName.description: The external system from where the record was imported.

Stage.description: Specifies the stage of the milestone.

StageComment.description: The comments about the stage of the milestone. For example, the                       reason for marking the milestone as tentative.

State.description: The state where the milestone occurred.

Street.description: The street where the milestone occurred.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the asset milestone.

AssetWarranty.name: AssetWarranty
AssetWarranty.description: Defines the warranty terms applicable to an asset along with any          exclusions and extensions.

AssetId.description: The ID of the asset this asset warranty applies to.

AssetWarrantyNumber.description: The identifier of the asset warranty record.

EndDate.description: The date on which this asset warranty expires.

ExchangeType.description: The type of exchange offered by this asset warranty.

ExpensesCoveredEndDate.description: The date on which cover for expenses ends.

IsTransferable.description: Indicates whether the asset warranty can be transferred to a new                       owner (true) or not (false).

LaborCoveredEndDate.description: The date on which cover for labor ends.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the asset warranty was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the asset warranty was last viewed.

PartsCoveredEndDate.description: The date on which cover for parts ends.

Pricebook2Id.description: The price book item associated with this asset warranty term.

StartDate.description: The date on which cover under this asset warranty starts.

WarrantyTermId.description: The ID of the warranty term this asset warranty term extends.

WarrantyType.description: The type of the asset warranty.

Claim.name: Claim
Claim.description: Represents a warranty Claim submitted by a partner to a manufacturer,          or a supplier recovery claim submitted by the manufacturer to a supplier.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account related to the claim.

ClaimReason.description: The reason for initiating the claim.

ClaimReasonType.description: The category to which the claim reason belongs.

FinalizedDate.description: The date on which the claim was marked resolved, with claim status                       as approved or rejected.

FnolChannel.description: The channel through which the loss was reported.

IsClosed.description: Indicates whether the claim has been closed (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The claim number in the claims management system.

OwnerId.description: ID of the record owner.

RelatedClaimId.description: ID of the claim related to this claim.

Status.description: The status of the claim.

TotalAdjustedAmount.description: The claim amount that was approved.

UsageType.description: The usage type of the Claims record.

ClaimCoverage.name: ClaimCoverage
ClaimCoverage.description: Represents a causal part in a defective asset that requires repair or          replacement.

AssetWarrantyId.description: The asset warranty ID of the defective asset in the associated                       claim item.

CausalPartId.description: The ID of the product part that causes the issues related to the                       claim.

ClaimId.description: The ID of the claim record associated with this claim                       coverage.

ClaimItemId.description: The ID of the claim item record associated with the claim                       coverage.

ClaimParticipantId.description: The ID of the claim participant record associated with this claim                       coverage.

Description.description: The description of the coverage for the claim.

ExtlWorkOrderReference.description: The external identifier of the work order.

FaultCodeId.description: The code ID that uniquely identifies the fault caused by the                       part.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the claim coverage.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

ProductRelatedMaterialId.description: The ID of the Product Related Material record that defines the                       association between the causal part and the product associated with                       the claim.

RelatedClaimCoverageId.description: The claim coverage against which the supplier recovery claim is                       created.

Status.description: The status of a claim coverage.

TotalAdjustedAmount.description: The total amount that's adjusted in a claim.

ClaimCoveragePaymentDetail.name: ClaimCoveragePaymentDetail
ClaimCoveragePaymentDetail.description: Represents the claim coverage amount that must be paid to a claimant for a          part replaced or replaced or a labor service performed to rectify a causal part in a          defective asset.

ActualExpense.description: The actual expense of the part replacement or labor service.

AdjustedAmount.description: The amount the manufacturer intends to pay to the claimant for the                       repair, replacement, or labor service to rectify a causal                       part.

ChargeTypeCodeId.description: The unique code that identifies the labor charge or expense.

ClaimCoverageId.description: The ID of the claim coverage record associated with the Claim                       Coverage Payment Detail.

ClaimedAmount.description: The amount claimed by the claimant as a part of the claim coverage                       payment detail.

Comment.description: The comments made by the warranty claims adjudicator while                       adjudicating the claim coverage payment detail.

Description.description: The description of the claim coverage payment detail.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view.

Name.description: The name of the claim coverage payment detail.

PriceBookEntryId.description: The entry of the product related to the replacement part in the                       price book.

CodeSet.name: CodeSet
CodeSet.description: Represents various industry defined codes in the context of their          systems and versions of those systems.

Code.description: The system-defined code that’s represented by this code set.

CodeDescription.description: Additional information associated with the code set.

CodeSetKey.description: A unique key that identifies the concept represented by code sets                       across different systems and versions. This key is not case                       sensitive.

CodeSetType.description: The type of the code set.

EndDate.description: The end date of the code set’s effective period.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the code set is an active code set (true) or not (false).

IsCustomCode.description: Indicates whether the code set is defined by a specific                       organization, as opposed to recognized across the industry.

IsPrimary.description: Indicates whether the code set is the primary code set for the                       concept (true) or not (false). That is, it was selected                       manually by a user instead of being selected by an automated                       process.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record                       related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.                       If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was                       referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: A reference to the person who owns the code set record.

StartDate.description: The start date of the code set’s effective period.

SystemVersion.description: The version of the source system the code belongs to.

EndDateTime.description: The date and time when the engagement with the attendee ends.

EngagementId.description: Required. The engagement interaction, messaging session, or voice                       call that’s related to the attendee.

ExternalAttendeeId.description: The external user related to the engagement, such as the customer                       or partner. To avoid an error, either this field or the InternalAttendeeId field must have                       a value.

InternalAttendeeId.description: The internal user related to the engagement, such as the call                       center agent. To avoid an error, either this field or the                       ExternalAttendeeId field must have a value.

IsAuthenticated.description: Indicates whether the initiating attendee of the engagement                       interaction was authenticated through interactive voice response                       (IVR) or Web channel (true) or                       not (false). The default value                       is false.

IsVerified.description: Indicates whether the initiating attendee of the engagement                       interaction was verified (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed                       this record or list view (LastReferencedDate)                       but not viewed it.

Name.description: The name of the Engagement Attendee record.

OwnerId.description: The Salesforce ID of the person who owns this engagement attendee                       record.

Role.description: The role of an engagement attendee. This field is                          available in API version 56.0 and later. Possible values are:                          OnBehalf                           Self

StartDateTime.description: Required. The date and time when the engagement with the attendee                       starts.

VerificationTime.description: The time when the attendee was verified for the engagement                       interaction. This field is available in API version 56.0 and                       later.

AttendeeVerificationTime.description: The time when the attendee was verified for the engagement                       interaction. You can manually set this time. If isAttendeeVerified is set to true,                       then if you don’t manually set this time, it’s set based on the                       current system date and time.

CommunicationChannel.description: Required. The communication channel through which engagement                       interaction occurs.

ContextId.description: The ID of the record that’s considered as the context for the                       engagement interaction. For example, when a customer initiates an                       engagement interaction by booking a service appointment for an                       inquiry, the service appointment is the context for that engagement                       interaction.

Duration.description: Read-only. The duration of the engagement interaction based on the                       start date time and end date time. The duration is calculated when                       the end time is updated.

EndDateTime.description: The date and time when the engagement interaction ends.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The unique external identifier of the engagement interaction.

InitiatingAttendeeId.description: The attendee who initiated the engagement interaction.

IsAttendeeAuthenticated.description: Indicates whether the initiating attendee of the engagement                       interaction has been authenticated through IVR or Web channel                          (true) or not (false).

IsAttendeeVerified.description: Indicates whether the initiating attendee of the engagement                       interaction has been verified (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed                       this record or list view (LastReferencedDate)                       but not viewed it.

OwnerId.description: The Salesforce ID of the person who owns this engagement                       interaction record.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the engagement interaction, which also                       impacts the interaction state.

Type.description: Specifies the type of interaction that was initiated by the                       attendee.

EngagementId.description: The engagement interaction, messaging session, or voice call                       record that’s related to the topic discussed during the                       engagement.

InteractionSummary.description: The summary of the engagement interaction. This field is available                       in API version 56.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a                       record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed                       this record or list view (LastReferencedDate)                       but not viewed it.

OwnerId.description: The Salesforce ID of the person who owns this engagement topic                       record.

ProcessType.description: The type of the process executed during the engagement                       interaction.

TopicId.description: The engagement topic record that’s associated with the parent                       engagement topic.

InventoryCountPlan.name: InventoryCountPlan
InventoryCountPlan.description: Represents a plan to count inventory at a location.

CountInterval.description: The interval between the planned start dates of two consecutive                       assessments related to this plan. For example, if the Count                       Interval is 5 and the Count Interval Unit of Measure is Monthly,                       then the interval between the planned start dates of the                       assessments is five months.

CountIntervalUnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure of the interval between two consecutive                       assessments related to this plan. If you select Once, only one                       assessment is created.

CountWindowDays.description: The number of days between the planned start and end date of each                       assessment related to this plan. For example, if the count window                       days is 5, and the planned start date of an assessment in this plan                       is January 4, 2024 at 9:00 AM, then the planned end date of that                       assessment is January 9, 2024 at 9:00 AM. If you don't specify a                       value, then the count interval is considered as the count window.

For example, if an OEM is planning to manufacture 10,000 cars of                       the ABC model in December 2021 and 25% will be manufactured at                       plant XYZ, 25% is the market share.

ProductItem.name: ProductItem

When you                       associated a return order with a product request, you can associate                       the return order’s line items with the product request’s line                          items.A return order might be related to a product request if                          the return order tracks the return of unused products or                          products to be repaired or replaced. For example, a technician                          creates a product request for three motors to prepare for a                          field visit. If the technician finds that only two motors are                          needed, they can create a return order to return the third to                          the original location, and list the product request in this                          field.

ReturnOrderNumber.description: The auto-generated number identifying the return order.

ShipFromAddress.description: The return shipping address. This address tracks the location of                       the items at the start of the return or repair. For example, if a                       customer is returning an item, the Ship From address is the                       customer’s address.

ShipFromCity.description: The city of the return shipping address. This address tracks the                       location of the items at the start of the return or repair. For                       example, if a customer is returning an item, the Ship From address                       is the customer’s address.

ShipFromCountry.description: The country of the return shipping address. This address tracks                       the location of the items at the start of the return or repair. For                       example, if a customer is returning an item, the Ship From address                       is the customer’s address.

ShipFromGeocodeAccuracy.description: Accuracy level of the geocode for the return shipping address.

ShipFromLatitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the                       return shipping address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90                       and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

ShipFromLongitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the                       return shipping address. Acceptable values are numbers between –180                       and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

ShipFromPostalCode.description: The postal code of the return shipping address. This address                       tracks the location of the items at the start of the return or                       repair. For example, if a customer is returning an item, the Ship                       From address is the customer’s address.

ShipFromState.description: The state of the return shipping address. This address tracks the                       location of the items at the start of the return or repair. For                       example, if a customer is returning an item, the Ship From address                       is the customer’s address.

ShipFromStreet.description: The street of the return shipping address. This address tracks the                       location of the items at the start of the return or repair. For                       example, if a customer is returning an item, the Ship From address                       is the customer’s address.

ShipmentType.description: The type of shipment associated with the return order. Available                       values are:                           Standard (default                             value)                           Rush                           Overnight                           Next Business Day                           Pick Up

SourceLocationId.description: The items’ location at the start of the return or repair. For                       example, if the return order tracks the return of products from a                       technician’s service center to a warehouse, the service center is                       the source location.

Status.description: The status of the return order. Available values are:                          Draft                           Submitted                           Approved                           Canceled                           Closed

StatusCategory.description: Status category of the return order. Processing of the return                       order depends on this value. Each status category corresponds to                       one or more statuses.

ReturnOrderLineItem.name: ReturnOrderLineItem
ReturnOrderLineItem.description: Represents a product that is returned, recalled, or repaired as part of a          return order.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the return order line item.

Description.description: The description of the return order line item.

DestinationLocationId.description: The location where the items are being returned to. For example,                       if the return order tracks the return of products from a technician                       center to a warehouse, the warehouse is the destination                       location.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related                       record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, and                          LastReferenceDate isn’t null, the user                       accessed this record or list view indirectly.

OrderItemId.description: The order product associated with the return order line item.

ProcessingPlan.description: Specifies the preferred fate of the items after their return.                       Available values are:                           Repair—Repair                             the items and return them to the owner                            Discard—Discard                             the items                            Salvage—Salvage                             the items’ working parts                            Restock—Return                             the items to your inventory

Product2Id.description: The product associated with the return order line item.

ProductItemId.description: The product item representing the location of the product at the                       start of the return.

ProductRequestLineItemId.description: The product request line item associated with the return order                       line item.

QuantityExpected.description: The quantity of items expected to be returned.

QuantityReceived.description: The actual quantity of items received for return.

QuantityRejected.description: The quantity of items rejected for return.

QuantityReturned.description: The quantity of items being returned. If multiple types of                       products are being returned, track each product in a different                       return order line item.

QuantityUnitOfMeasure.description: Units of the returned items. For example, kilograms or liters.                       Quantity Unit of Measure picklist values are inherited from the                       Quantity Unit of Measure field on products.

ReasonForRejection.description: Reason for rejecting returned items on this return order line                       item.

ReasonForReturn.description: The reason the items are being returned. Available values are:                          Damaged                           Defective                           Duplicate Order                           Wrong Item                           Wrong Quantity                           Not Satisfied                           Outdated                           Other

ReasonForChangeText.description: The details about the reason for the return change

RepaymentMethod.description: The method by which the customer or owner will be reimbursed for                       the items being returned. Available values are:                           Replace—The                             items will be replaced                            Refund—The items                             will be returned and the owner will be refunded                            Credit—The items                             will be returned and the owner will receive credit for                             them                            Return—The items                             will be returned to the owner (for example, following their                             repair)

ReturnOrderId.description: The return order that the return order line item belongs to.

ReturnOrderLineItemNumber.description: The auto-generated number that identifies the return order line                       item.

SourceLocationId.description: The items’ location at the start of the return or repair. For                       example, if the return order tracks the return of products from a                       technician’s service center to a warehouse, the service vehicle is                       the source location.

SalesAgreement.name: SalesAgreement
SalesAgreement.description: Represents a long-term agreement between a buyer and a seller to negotiate       price and volume of products.

ActualMarginPercentage.description: The total actual margin amount as a percentage of total actual amount.

ContactId.description: ID of a contact associated with the sales agreement account.

FutureActCalcSchedules.description: The number of future schedules to include in actuals calculations in the            sales agreement.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was viewed.

Name.description: User-defined name of the sales agreement.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns this record.

PlannedMarginPercentage.description: The total planned margin amount as a percentage of total planned            amount.

PriceAdjustmentScheduleId.description: The price adjustment schedule that's associated with the sales agreement.            Available in API version 59.0 and later.

PricebookId.description: ID of the associated price book.

ProductLevel.description: Level of the products associated with the sales agreement.

ReferenceFieldId.description: The manufacturing program associated with the sales agreement. Available in            API version 57.0 and later.

RenewedFromAgreementId.description: ID of the immediate parent from which the sales agreement is renewed.

TotalActualAgreementAmount.description: The sum of the total actual amounts across all products in a sales            agreement.

TotalActualCostAmount.description: The sum of the total actual cost amounts across all products in a sales            agreement.

TotalActualMarginAmount.description: The sum of the total actual margin amounts across all products in a sales            agreement.

TotalAgreementAmount.description: Total value of the sales agreement.

TotalPlannedCostAmount.description: The sum of the total planned cost amounts across all products in a sales            agreement.

TotalPlannedMarginAmount.description: The sum of the total planned margin amounts across all products in a sales            agreement.

TotalProposedAgreementAmount.description: Total value of the sales agreement when the sales agreement is under            revision.

SalesAgreementProdSchdAdj.description: Represents the manual adjustments made to metric values for a sales agreement       product schedule.

SalesAgreementProduct.name: SalesAgreementProduct
SalesAgreementProduct.description: Represents the total quantity or amount and the default pricing information of       a product or category across the total time period of the sales agreement.

ActualMarginPercentage.description: The total actual margin amount as a percentage of total actual amount.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which this record was viewed.

SalesPrice.description: Price per unit of the unit at which you initially decide to sell the            product.

TotalActualMarginAmount.description: The sum of the actual margin amounts across all schedules in a sales            agreement.

TotalPlannedCostAmount.description: The sum of the planned cost amounts across all schedules in a sales            agreement.

TotalPlannedMarginAmount.description: The sum of the planned margin amounts across all schedules in a sales            agreement.

TotalPlannedQuantity.description: Field displaying the sum of planned quantities across all schedules at a            given time.

SalesAgreementProductSchedule.name: SalesAgreementProductSchedule

PlannedQuantityValue.description: The planned quantity of a product for a specific schedule in a sales            agreement. This field stores the planned quantity in decimals.

PlannedShipmentQuantity.description: The planned quantity of a product to be shipped to a partner.

ProposedCostPrice.description: The proposed cost for one unit of a product when the sales agreement is            under revision.

ProposedDerivedPlannedAm.description: Planned amount for a product for a specific schedule when the sales            agreement is under revision.

ProposedPlannedQuantity.description: Planned quantity for a product for a specific schedule when the sales            agreement is under revision.

WarrantyTermName.description: The name of the warranty term.

WarrantyTermCoverage.name: WarrantyTermCoverage
WarrantyTermCoverage.description: Represents a junction between the warranty term coverage and a          product or codeset, such as the repair code or labor code.

CoveredCodeId.description: The labor code or expense code that's associated with the coverage                       for the warranty term.

IsExcluded.description: Indicates whether the product, labor code, or fault code is                       excluded from the warranty term (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record                       indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or                       list view. If this value is null, and                          LastReferenceDate is not null, the user                       accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The autogenerated name of the warranty term coverage.

ProductPartId.description: The part of the product that's covered in the warranty term.

WarrantyTermId.description: The warranty term associated with the product, fault, or labor                       code.

WorkOrder.description: The work order associated with the diagnosis.

WorkOrderLineItem.description: The work order line item associated with the diagnosis.

FaultCode.description: The fault code associated with the asset or product.

CausalPart.description: The part of the asset or product causing the fault.

Diagnosis.description: The details of the fault or issue that's being diagnosed.

Solution.description: The details about the solution to fix the fault.
